collections_text:
# experience automotive history & culture

Welcome to the Automobile Driving Museum, one of Southern California’s premier destinations for car enthusiasts where museum visitors experience a wide range of vehicles from years gone by. The museum is committed to the preservation and maintenance of these cherished age-old automobiles for generations to come.

**THE MUSEUM IS NOW CLOSED, THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!**

[ Get Tickets ](/web/20250405044921/https://automobiledrivingmuseum.org/tickets)

## upcoming events

[ see all events ](/web/20250405044921/https://automobiledrivingmuseum.org/events)

* * *

#### On Display now!

* * *

# THE 1949 Kurtis Sports Car

Enter the 1949 Kurtis Sport Car, a motoring symphony meticulously composed in steel and leather, now on loan to the museum for a limited time from MotorTrend, adding a chapter of elegance to an already illustrious tale of automotive marvels.

* * *

#### NEWS

* * *

# upholding the honor

When Aaron Gold, senior editor and writer for Motor Trend, entered a bet with fellow Motor Trend’s editorial chief Erik Johnson, it resulted in what Gold dubbed Detroit vs. L.A.! The Knock-Down, Drag-Out, Incredibly Dumb Corvette Z06 Scavenger Hunt.

[ learn more ](http://web.archive.org/web/20250405044921/https://www.motortrend.com/features/detroit-vs-los-angeles-chevy-corvette-z06-feature/)
